name: Squirrel Bro
description:
Squirrel Bro is a very unique cute game where you control two cute squirrels AT THE SAME TIME to try to reach the Magic Nut place in the game to win. Each squirrel has 3 different weapons but lots of enemies are trying hard to preventing you from fulfilling your mission!

Plus, you have to do it within a limited period of time. Collect as many coins as you can because they matter for your score if you win the game!
